## JsonRpcProvider.export() method

Returns a stream of bytes with CAR dump of chain data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export(nroots: ChainEpoch, tipSetKey: TipSetKey): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nroots | ChainEpoch |  |
|  tipSetKey | TipSetKey |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Remarks

The exported chain data includes the header chain from the given tipset back to genesis, the entire genesis state, and the most recent 'nroots' state trees.
